content:
NOTIFICATIONS

From the Menu, you can choose to go to Broker Messages or Notifications Center.

1. Broker Messages

All your Broker Messages such as recommendations and updates about securities/scrips will be available here.

2. Notifications Center

  • Exchange Messages - All the messages from Exchanges will be updated here.

  • Order Messages - Detailed messages related to your orders, will be updated here.

  • Notification - Here, you will be notified if your order is in pending/executed or if you have modified it.
